This package is for creating applications.
TeraApp Platforms - Windows

``# app = TeraApp('title', x, y 'color')``

``# app = TeraAppWIcon('title', x, y 'logo', 'color')``

``app.txt(args)``

``app.icon(args)``

``app.img(args)``

``app.input(args)``

``app.button(args)``

``app.sidebar(args)``

``app.appbar(args)``

``app.buttonf(args) - button with function``

``app.inputr(args) - input with resize``

``app.buttonfr(args) - button with function and resize``

``app.txtc(args) - text with color``

``app.sound(args)``

``app.gif(args)``

`app.loadingscreen(args)`


``app.app.exec()``
